artist: Etcher: Ange-Laurent de La Live de Jully; Designer: Jean-Baptiste Greuze
creditline: Gift of funds from Janet and Winton Jones and John E. Andrus III
description: young woman wearing a bonnet and long dress, carrying an infant, with a toddler strapped to her back and two other young children to her right
signed: LLC, in the plate: [Greuse ins.]; LRC, in the plate: [A.L. De Lalive Sc.]; bottom center, in the plate: [LA MERE DE FAMILLE.]
title: La Mere de Famille, no. 57, from a recueil of etchings
